   19: %%
   20: -module(atomics_SUITE).
   21: -export([suite/0, all/0,
   22:          signed/1, unsigned/1, bad/1, signed_limits/1, unsigned_limits/1,
   23:          error_info/1]).
   24: 
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: 
   27: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   28: 
   29: all() ->
   30:     [signed, unsigned, bad, signed_limits, unsigned_limits,
   31:      error_info].
   32: 
   33: signed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   34:     Size = 10,
   35:     Ref = atomics:new(Size,[]),
   36:     #{size:=Size, memory:=Memory} = atomics:info(Ref),
   37:     {_,true} = {Memory, Memory > Size*8},
   38:     {_,true} = {Memory, Memory < Size*max_atomic_sz() + 100},
   39:     [signed_do(Ref, Ix) || Ix <- lists:seq(1, Size)],
   40:     ok.
   41: 
   42: signed_do(Ref, Ix) ->
   43:     0 = atomics:get(Ref, Ix),
   44:     ok = atomics:put(Ref, Ix, 3),
   45:     ok = atomics:add(Ref, Ix, 14),
   46:     17 = atomics:get(Ref, Ix),
   47:     20 = atomics:add_get(Ref, Ix, 3),
   48:     -3 = atomics:add_get(Ref, Ix, -23),
   49:     17 = atomics:add_get(Ref, Ix, 20),
   50:     ok = atomics:sub(Ref, Ix, 4),
   51:     13 = atomics:get(Ref, Ix),
   52:     -7 = atomics:sub_get(Ref, Ix, 20),
   53:     3  = atomics:sub_get(Ref, Ix, -10),
   54:     3  = atomics:exchange(Ref, Ix, 666),
   55:     ok = atomics:compare_exchange(Ref, Ix, 666, 777),
   56:     777 = atomics:compare_exchange(Ref, Ix, 666, -666),
   57:     ok.
   58: 
   59: unsigned(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   60:     Size = 10,
   61:     Ref = atomics:new(Size,[{signed, false}]),
   62:     #{size:=Size, memory:=Memory} = atomics:info(Ref),
   63:     true = Memory > Size*8,
   64:     true = Memory < Size*max_atomic_sz() + 100,
   65:     [unsigned_do(Ref, Ix) || Ix <- lists:seq(1, Size)],
   66:     ok.
   67: 
   68: unsigned_do(Ref, Ix) ->
   69:     0 = atomics:get(Ref, Ix),
   70:     ok = atomics:put(Ref, Ix, 3),
   71:     ok = atomics:add(Ref, Ix, 14),
   72:     17 = atomics:get(Ref, Ix),
   73:     20 = atomics:add_get(Ref, Ix, 3),
   74:     ok = atomics:sub(Ref, Ix, 7),
   75:     13 = atomics:get(Ref, Ix),
   76:     3  = atomics:sub_get(Ref, Ix, 10),
   77:     3  = atomics:exchange(Ref, Ix, 666),
   78:     ok = atomics:compare_exchange(Ref, Ix, 666, 777),
   79:     777 = atomics:compare_exchange(Ref, Ix, 666, 888),
   80:     ok.
   81: 
   82: bad(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   83:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch atomics:new(-(1 bsl 64),[])),
   84:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch atomics:new(0,[])),
   85:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch atomics:new(10,[bad])),
   86:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch atomics:new(10,[{signed,bad}])),
   87:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch atomics:new(10,[{signed,true}, bad])),
   88:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch atomics:new(10,[{signed,false} | bad])),
   89: 
   90:     {'EXIT',{system_limit,_}} = (catch atomics:new(1 bsl 64, [])),
   91: 
   92:     Ref = atomics:new(10,[]),
   93:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch atomics:get(1742, 7)),
   94:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch atomics:get(make_ref(), 7)),
   95:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch atomics:get(Ref, -1)),
   96:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch atomics:get(Ref, 0)),
   97:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch atomics:get(Ref, 11)),
   98:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch atomics:get(Ref, 7.0)),
   99:     ok.
  100: 
  101: 
  102: signed_limits(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  103:     Bits = 64,
  104:     Max = (1 bsl (Bits-1)) - 1,
  105:     Min = -(1 bsl (Bits-1)),
  106: 
  107:     Ref = atomics:new(1,[{signed, true}]),
  108:     #{max:=Max, min:=Min} = atomics:info(Ref),
  109:     0 = atomics:get(Ref, 1),
  110:     ok = atomics:add(Ref, 1, Max),
  111:     Min = atomics:add_get(Ref, 1, 1),
  112:     Max = atomics:sub_get(Ref, 1, 1),
  113: 
  114:     IncrMax = (Max bsl 1) bor 1,
  115:     ok = atomics:put(Ref, 1, 0),
  116:     ok = atomics:add(Ref, 1, IncrMax),
  117:     -1 = atomics:get(Ref, 1),
  118:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch atomics:add(Ref, 1, IncrMax+1)),
  119:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch atomics:add(Ref, 1, Min-1)),
  120: 
  121:     ok.
  122: 
  123: unsigned_limits(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  124:     Bits = 64,
  125:     Max = (1 bsl Bits) - 1,
  126:     Min = 0,
  127: 
  128:     Ref = atomics:new(1,[{signed,false}]),
  129:     #{max:=Max, min:=Min} = atomics:info(Ref),
  130:     0 = atomics:get(Ref, 1),
  131:     ok = atomics:add(Ref, 1, Max),
  132:     Min = atomics:add_get(Ref, 1, 1),
  133:     Max = atomics:sub_get(Ref, 1, 1),
  134: 
  135:     atomics:put(Ref, 1, Max),
  136:     io:format("Max=~p~n", [atomics:get(Ref, 1)]),
  137: 
  138:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch atomics:add(Ref, 1, Max+1)),
  139:     IncrMin = -(1 bsl (Bits-1)),
  140:     ok = atomics:put(Ref, 1, -IncrMin),
  141:     ok = atomics:add(Ref, 1, IncrMin),
  142:     0 = atomics:get(Ref, 1),
  143:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch atomics:add(Ref, 1, IncrMin-1)),
  144: 
  145:     ok.
  146: 
  147: max_atomic_sz() ->
  148:     case erlang:system_info({wordsize, external}) of
  149:         4 -> 16;
  150:         8 ->
  151:             EI = erlang:system_info(ethread_info),
  152:             case lists:keyfind("64-bit native atomics", 1, EI) of
  153:                 {_, "no", _} -> 16;
  154:                 _ -> 8
  155:             end
  156:     end.
  157: 
  158: error_info(_Config) ->
  159:     Atomics = atomics:new(10, []),
  160:     Huge = 1 bsl 64,
  161: 
  162:     L = [{add,[bad_ref, 1, 99]},
  163:          {add,[make_ref(), 1, 99]},
  164:          {add,[Atomics, bad_index, bad_value]},
  165:          {add,[Atomics, 1, Huge]},
  166:          {add,[Atomics, 0, 99]},
  167:          {add,[Atomics, 11, 99]},
  168: 
  169:          {add_get,[make_ref(), 1, 99]},
  170:          {add_get,[Atomics, bad_index, bad_value]},
  171:          {add_get,[Atomics, 0, 99]},
  172:          {add_get,[Atomics, 11, 99]},
  173: 
  174:          {compare_exchange,[make_ref(), 1, 50, 99]},
  175:          {compare_exchange,[Atomics, bad_index, 50, 99]},
  176:          {compare_exchange,[Atomics, 0, 50, 99]},
  177:          {compare_exchange,[Atomics, 11, 50, 99]},
  178: 
  179:          {exchange,[make_ref(), 1, 50]},
  180:          {exchange,[Atomics, bad_index, 50]},
  181:          {exchange,[Atomics, 0, 50]},
  182:          {exchange,[Atomics, 11, 50]},
  183:          {exchange,[Atomics, 1, Huge]},
  184: 
  185:          {get, [make_ref(), 1]},
  186:          {get, [Atomics, 0]},
  187:          {get, [Atomics, bad_index]},
  188:          {get, [Atomics, 11]},
  189: 
  190:          {info, [make_ref()]},
  191:          {info, [abc]},
  192: 
  193:          {new, [0, []]},
  194:          {new, [11, bad_option_list]},
  195:          {new, [11, [bad_option]]},
  196:          {new, [1 bsl 64, []]},
  197: 
  198:          {put, [make_ref(), 1, 42]},
  199:          {put, [Atomics, 1, Huge]},
  200:          {put, [Atomics, 0, 42]},
  201:          {put, [Atomics, 11, 42]},
  202:          {put, [Atomics, 0, abc]},
  203: 
  204:          {sub, [make_ref(), 1, 99]},
  205:          {sub, [Atomics, bad_index, bad_value]},
  206:          {sub, [Atomics, 0, 99]},
  207:          {sub, [Atomics, 11, 99]},
  208: 
  209:          {sub_get, [make_ref(), 0, 99]},
  210:          {sub_get, [Atomics, bad_index, bad_value]},
  211:          {sub_get, [Atomics, 0, 99]},
  212:          {sub_get, [Atomics, 11, 99]}
  213:         ],
  214:     do_error_info(L).
  215: 
  216: do_error_info(L0) ->
  217:     L1 = lists:foldl(fun({_,A}, Acc) when is_integer(A) -> Acc;
  218:                         ({F,A}, Acc) -> [{F,A,[]}|Acc];
  219:                         ({F,A,Opts}, Acc) -> [{F,A,Opts}|Acc]
  220:                      end, [], L0),
  221:     Tests = ordsets:from_list([{F,length(A)} || {F,A,_} <- L1] ++
  222:                                   [{F,A} || {F,A} <- L0, is_integer(A)]),
  223:     Bifs0 = [{F,A} || {F,A} <- atomics:module_info(exports),
  224:                       A =/= 0,
  225:                       F =/= module_info],
  226:     Bifs = ordsets:from_list(Bifs0),
  227:     NYI = [{F,lists:duplicate(A, '*'),nyi} || {F,A} <- Bifs -- Tests],
  228:     L = lists:sort(NYI ++ L1),
  229:     do_error_info(L, []).
  230: 
  231: do_error_info([{_,Args,nyi}=H|T], Errors) ->
  232:     case lists:all(fun(A) -> A =:= '*' end, Args) of
  233:         true ->
  234:             do_error_info(T, [{nyi,H}|Errors]);
  235:         false ->
  236:             do_error_info(T, [{bad_nyi,H}|Errors])
  237:     end;
  238: do_error_info([{F,Args,Opts}|T], Errors) ->
  239:     eval_bif_error(F, Args, Opts, T, Errors);
  240: do_error_info([], Errors0) ->
  241:     case lists:sort(Errors0) of
  242:         [] ->
  243:             ok;
  244:         [_|_]=Errors ->
  245:             io:format("\n~p\n", [Errors]),
  246:             ct:fail({length(Errors),errors})
  247:     end.
  248: 
  249: eval_bif_error(F, Args, Opts, T, Errors0) ->
  250:     Module = atomics,
  251:     try apply(Module, F, Args) of
  252:         Result ->
  253:             case lists:member(no_fail, Opts) of
  254:                 true ->
  255:                     do_error_info(T, Errors0);
  256:                 false ->
  257:                     do_error_info(T, [{should_fail,{F,Args},Result}|Errors0])
  258:             end
  259:     catch
  260:         error:Reason:Stk ->
  261:             SF = fun(Mod, _, _) -> Mod =:= test_server end,
  262:             Str = erl_error:format_exception(error, Reason, Stk, #{stack_trim_fun => SF}),
  263:             BinStr = iolist_to_binary(Str),
  264:             ArgStr = lists:join(", ", [io_lib:format("~p", [A]) || A <- Args]),
  265:             io:format("\n~p:~p(~s)\n~ts", [Module,F,ArgStr,BinStr]),
  266: 
  267:             case Stk of
  268:                 [{Module,ActualF,ActualArgs,Info}|_] ->
  269:                     RE = <<"[*][*][*] argument \\d+:">>,
  270:                     Errors1 = case re:run(BinStr, RE, [{capture, none}]) of
  271:                                   match ->
  272:                                       Errors0;
  273:                                   nomatch when Reason =:= system_limit ->
  274:                                       Errors0;
  275:                                   nomatch ->
  276:                                       [{no_explanation,{F,Args},Info}|Errors0]
  277:                               end,
  278: 
  279:                     Errors = case {ActualF,ActualArgs} of
  280:                                  {F,Args} ->
  281:                                      Errors1;
  282:                                  _ ->
  283:                                      [{renamed,{F,length(Args)},{ActualF,ActualArgs}}|Errors1]
  284:                              end,
  285: 
  286:                     do_error_info(T, Errors);
  287:                 _ ->
  288:                     Errors = [{renamed,{F,length(Args)},hd(Stk)}|Errors0],
  289:                     do_error_info(T, Errors)
  290:             end
  291:     end.
